name: Phantom Fuse
description:
Backstory

Play as Goon, a mobster that was left dead in an old castle. After death, he continued as a ghost, leaving his body behind. Goon needs to leave this castle in order to find those people who left him here. In his ghost form, Goon can't interact with many objects in the physical world, so he must merge into the objects to use them. The castle is riddled with objects in every room.  Every room has a puzzle that must solved in order to escape the castle.

Controls

Mouse click to move around.

Mouse click to merge into objects.

Use buttons on the HUD to interact and un-merge with objects.

Easter Egg

We have 1 Easter Egg in the game. Try to move around the map to find it!
